column1: #text=After a long day at school followed by soccer practice , taking a bath is one of the most relaxing and enjoyable parts of my day .
#text=First , I fill the tub with warm water .
#text=I like the water to be the perfect temperature ; not too hot , but not too cold .
#text=Sometimes I pour some bubble bath under the running faucet .
#text=The bubbles are fun and relaxing , not to mention they smell good too .
#text=While the water runs , I grab a large towel and washcloth , placing them near the tub .
#text=After undressing , I step into the tub and enjoy the warmth of the soapy water .
#text=I pour some shampoo on my palm , place my hands on my head , and rub vigorously .
#text=Then I rinse the shampoo out of my hair , and repeat the process with conditioner .
#text=Finally , I take a bar of soap and clean my entire body , using a washcloth to scrub .
#text=After my hair and body are clean , I drain the tub .
#text=I grab the towel , dry off , and get into my PJ ' s , ready for the new day ahead .
